name: Box Gutter Installation
template name: Eave and Box Gut - Box Gutter Installation Checklist

name: Insulation under gutter: Box gutter insulation and Barrier
Expansion Join: Box Gutter Expansion Join
Sumps / Outlets: Fix Only Syphonic Sump
